verses.verse: "Run back and <S%H7751>forth<s%> through the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3045>now,<s%> and know, and <S%H1245>seek<s%> in the broad <S%H7339>places<s%> of <S%H4672>it,<s%> if you can find a <S%H376>man,<s%> if there <S%H3426>are<s%> any who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H4941>justly,<s%> who <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H530>truth;<s%> and I will pardon <S%H5545>her.<s%>
Though they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'As Yahweh <S%H2416>lives;<s%>' surely they <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H8267>falsely.<s%>"

O <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5869>don't<s%> your eyes look on <S%H530>truth?<s%> You have <S%H5221>stricken<s%> <S%H2342>them,<s%> but they were not grieved. You have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H3985>them,<s%> but they have refused to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>correction.<s%> They have made their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H2388>harder<s%> than a <S%H5553>rock.<s%> They have <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7725>return.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> "Surely these are <S%H1800>poor.<s%> They are <S%H2973>foolish;<s%> for they <S%H3045>don't<s%> know the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> nor the <S%H4941>law<s%> of their <S%H430>God.<s%>

I will <S%H3212>go<s%> to the great <S%H1419>men,<s%> and will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H3045>them;<s%> for they know the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H4941>law<s%> of their <S%H430>God.<s%>" But these with one <S%H3162>accord<s%> have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke,<s%> and <S%H5423>burst<s%> the <S%H4147>bonds.<s%>

Therefore a <S%H738>lion<s%> out of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> shall <S%H5221>kill<s%> <S%H2061>them,<s%> a wolf of the <S%H6160>evenings<s%> shall <S%H7703>destroy<s%> <S%H5246>them,<s%> a leopard shall <S%H8245>watch<s%> against their <S%H5892>cities;<s%> everyone who goes <S%H3318>out<s%> there <S%H2007>shall<s%> be torn in <S%H2963>pieces;<s%> because their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H7231>many,<s%> and their <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> is <S%H6105>increased.<s%>

<S%H335>"How<s%> can I <S%H5545>pardon<s%> <S%H2063>you?<s%> Your <S%H1121>children<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H7650>me,<s%> and sworn by what are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%> When I had fed them to the <S%H7650>full,<s%> they committed <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> and assembled themselves in <S%H1413>troops<s%> at the <S%H2181>prostitutes<s%>' <S%H1004>houses.<s%>
They were as <S%H2109>fed<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> roaming at <S%H7904>large:<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H6670>neighed<s%> after his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%>
<S%H6485>Shouldn't<s%> I punish them for these <S%H5002>things?<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> "and <S%H5315>shouldn't<s%> my soul be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on such a nation as <S%H1471>this?<s%>

"Go <S%H5927>up<s%> on her <S%H8284>walls,<s%> and <S%H7843>destroy;<s%> but <S%H6213>don't<s%> make a full <S%H3617>end.<s%> Take <S%H5493>away<s%> her <S%H5189>branches;<s%> for they are not <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s.

For the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have dealt <S%H898>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

They have <S%H3584>denied<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is not <S%H7451>he;<s%> neither shall evil <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H7200>us;<s%> neither shall we see <S%H2719>sword<s%> nor <S%H7458>famine.<s%>
The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> shall become <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and the <S%H1696>word<s%> is not in <S%H6213>them.<s%> Thus shall it be done to them."

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "Because you <S%H1696>speak<s%> this <S%H1697>word,<s%> <S%H5414>behold,<s%> I will make my <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> and this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and it shall devour <S%H398>them.<s%>

<S%H935>Behold,<s%> I will bring a <S%H1471>nation<s%> on you from <S%H4801>far,<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> "It is a <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%> It is an <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> whose <S%H3956>language<s%> you <S%H3045>don't<s%> know, neither <S%H8085>understand<s%> what they <S%H1696>say.<s%>
Their <S%H827>quiver<s%> is an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6913>tomb,<s%> they are all mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%>

They shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> your <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and your <S%H3899>bread,<s%> which your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> should <S%H398>eat.<s%> They shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds.<s%> They shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> your <S%H1612>vines<s%> and your fig <S%H8384>trees.<s%> They shall beat <S%H7567>down<s%> your <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> in which <S%H2007>you<s%> <S%H982>trust,<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
"But even in those <S%H3117>days,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "I will not <S%H6213>make<s%> a full end with <S%H3617>you.<s%>

It will <S%H559>happen,<s%> when you say, <S%H8478><s%> 'Why has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> all these things to <S%H559>us?<s%>' Then you shall say to <S%H5800>them,<s%> 'Just like you have forsaken <S%H5647>me,<s%> and served <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> so you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> in a land that is not <S%H776>yours.<s%>'
<S%H5046>"Declare<s%> this in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> it in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H8085><s%> 'Hear now <S%H5530>this,<s%> foolish <S%H5971>people,<s%> and without <S%H3820>understanding;<s%> who have <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>don't<s%> see; who have <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H8085>don't<s%> hear:

<S%H3372>Don't<s%> you fear <S%H5002>me?<s%>' says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2342><s%> 'Won't you tremble at my <S%H6440>presence,<s%> who have <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H2344>sand<s%> for the <S%H1366>bound<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>decree,<s%> that it <S%H5674>can't<s%> pass <S%H1530>it?<s%> and though its waves <S%H1607>toss<s%> <S%H3201>themselves,<s%> yet they can't prevail; though they <S%H1993>roar,<s%> yet they <S%H5674>can't<s%> pass over it.'
"But this <S%H5971>people<s%> has a <S%H5637>revolting<s%> and a <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> they have <S%H5493>revolted<s%> and <S%H3212>gone.<s%>

Neither do they <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H3372><s%> 'Let us now fear <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H1653>rain,<s%> both the <S%H3138>former<s%> and the <S%H4456>latter,<s%> in its <S%H6256>season;<s%> who <S%H8104>preserves<s%> to us the <S%H2708>appointed<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> of the <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>'
"Your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have turned <S%H5186>away<s%> these <S%H2403>things,<s%> and your sins have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> good from <S%H2896>you.<s%>

For among my <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7918>men.<s%> They watch, as <S%H3353>fowlers<s%> lie in <S%H7789>wait.<s%> They <S%H5324>set<s%> a <S%H4889>trap.<s%> They <S%H3920>catch<s%> <S%H582>men.<s%>

As a <S%H3619>cage<s%> is <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5775>birds,<s%> so are their <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit.<s%> Therefore they have become <S%H1431>great,<s%> and grew <S%H6238>rich.<s%>

They have grown <S%H8080>fat.<s%> They <S%H6245>shine;<s%> <S%H5674>yes,<s%> they excell in <S%H1697>deeds<s%> of <S%H7451>wickedness.<s%> They <S%H1777>don't<s%> plead the <S%H1779>cause,<s%> the cause of the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> that they may <S%H6743>prosper;<s%> and they <S%H8199>don't<s%> judge the <S%H4941>right<s%> of the <S%H34>needy.<s%>
"Shall I not <S%H6485>punish<s%> for these <S%H5002>things?<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> "Shall not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on such a nation as <S%H1471>this?<s%>
"An <S%H8047>astonishing<s%> and horrible <S%H8186>thing<s%> has <S%H1961>happened<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7287>rule<s%> by their own <S%H3027>authority;<s%> and my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> to have it <S%H6213>so.<s%> What will you do in the end of <S%H319>it?<s%>
